mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reports of cases argued and adjudged in the courts of King's Bench, Common Pleas and Exchequer. [1695-1741]: To which are added, some special cases in the Court of Chancery; and before the Delegates / By the Right Hon. Sir John Comyns .. With tables of the cases, and of the principal matters
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Comyns, John Sir, approximately 1667-1740
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
Great Britain. High Court of Delegates.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by A. Strahan and W. Woodfall, for Whieldon and Butterworth
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Written in 'law French Ì“... Translated by the judge's nephew, J. Comyns of the Inner Temple."--Dict. Nat. Biog., v. 11, p. 465.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain
